mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select p.Zj_Name,p.rh_Amt,p.rh_Add_Amt,p.rh_Unadd_Amt,p.rh_Add_rate from ( select case when p1.ZJ is null then S.BRANCH_AREA_NAME else p1.ZJ end Zj_Name,count(*) rh_Amt, sum(case when s.ITV_ASSET_ROW_ID is not null then 1 else 0 end ) rh_Add_Amt, sum(case when s.ITV_ASSET_ROW_ID is null then 1 else 0 end ) rh_Unadd_Amt, sum(case when s.ITV_ASSET_ROW_ID is not null then 1 else 0 end )/count(*) rh_Add_rate from XFY_RPT_RH_ORDER_ASSET s left join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY P1 ON s.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=P1.MKT_NAME where S.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and S.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and s.KHQ='公众' and s.prom_amt>=129 group by case when p1.ZJ is null then S.BRANCH_AREA_NAME else p1.ZJ end)p right join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_PAR p3 on p.Zj_Name=p3.Zj_Abbr_Name WHERE p3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') order by p3.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) union all select '合计' as Zj_Name,count(*) rh_Amt, sum(case when s.ITV_ASSET_ROW_ID is not null then 1 else 0 end ) rh_Add_Amt, sum(case when s.ITV_ASSET_ROW_ID is null then 1 else 0 end ) rh_Unadd_Amt, sum(case when s.ITV_ASSET_ROW_ID is not null then 1 else 0 end )/count(*) rh_Add_rate from XFY_RPT_RH_ORDER_ASSET s where S.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and S.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and s.KHQ='公众' and s.prom_amt>=129

SELECT case when C.ZJ is null then b.BRANCH_AREA_NAME else C.ZJ end AS BRANCH_AREA_NAME , b.CPL_DT,b.ACCS_NBR_ZK,b.PROM_AMT,b.ZK_STAT_NAME,b.YW_TYPE,b.SALES_DEPT_NAME,b.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID, b.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME,b.ACCS_NBR_FK1,b.ACCS_NBR_FK2,b.ACCS_NBR_FK3,b.ACCS_NBR_FK4, b.PROM_TYPE_BD,b.KD_ASSET_ROW_ID,b.ITV_ASSET_ROW_ID,b.KHQ FROM XFY_RPT_RH_ORDER_ASSET b LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY c ON B.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=c.MKT_NAME where b.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and b.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and b.KHQ='公众' and b.prom_amt>=129 AND B.ITV_ASSET_ROW_ID IS NULL and case when C.ZJ is null then b.BRANCH_AREA_NAME else C.ZJ end in ( select D.zj_new from XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D where d.zj_old = #{zj_name} )
